title: ABG Capital Recognized on Inc. 5000 List for 2015
text:
ABG Capital Ranks Among Short List of Pittsburgh Region Inc. 5000 Businesses
Pittsburgh, PA (PRWEB) August 25, 2015
ABG Capital, a business management firm and technological and software innovator, announced being named on the Inc. 5000 list for 2015.
“We’re a fun company. Our employees are like family; they take pride in what they do here and work hard because it means a lot to them. We strike that perfect balance between getting our work done while keeping a festive culture. It just works,” explained CEO Jeff Tapolci.
Inc. Magazine annually announces its list of the 5,000 fastest-growing private companies in America ranked by the percentage of growth of their annual revenue over a three-year period. Founded in 1992, with its 56 employees ABG Capital showed a 58% growth over the past three years.
ABG Capital has also been recognized as one of the Best Places to Work in PA, Best places to Work in Western PA, Pittsburgh 100, and last ranked among the Inc. 5000 in 2009.
ABG Capital is a privately held business management company located in Pittsburgh, PA. ABG Capital supports its portfolio company’s growth and success by offering aggregated back office services such as accounting, administrative, legal, IT, software development, HR, and marketing communications. Offering these services allows for the portfolio companies to have a competitive advantage as well as an equation for quick paced success. For more information, please visit the ABG Capital Blog.
